name: Jo Lule

text: I tried Blaze Pizza today for the first time. I was surprised by the selections there. Fresh salads, build your own pizza or one of the many already on the menu. The crust is made on site, regular, gluten free, vegan or even cauliflower! ‚Ä¶More

name: Silas S
text: I've eaten here a handful of times now. The staff is very friendly even when there's a crowd. I love the Simple Pie the best, but also love the BYO. Pricing is reasonable. The flavor of the pizza is outstanding. The roasted garlic is truly roasted. So many topping choices that I'll be eating my way through the menu for awhile.

name: Mara W
text: Delicious pizza. Get the toppings you want with no extra charge. Delicious gluten free. They will ask if you have a gluten allergy and clean the our off if you so. Yummy!

name: Benelli Amosah

text: Amazing Pizza! They were out of a few toppings and the staff were messing around but good food. It took half an hour to order but amazing food again. I recommend if you are willing to spend a few minutes.

name: C Me

text: Good pizza.  Slightly greasy.  Build your own is any toppings for same price.  They have also joined the woke brigade by using strawless cups which suck.  See picture... The lids are so hard to get on you crush the cup.  Why not used paper cups wouldn't that save more plastic?  You can ask for a straw if you prefer.

text: Great pizza.  Way too slow.  Took 45 minutes to get up to the counter to place my order.  There were only 8 people in front of me.  Assembly line pizza makers could learn a little from Domino's Pizza makers.

name: Nancy Naujoks
text: More and more choices to truly personalize your pizza experience. We enjoyed a take 2 with arugula berry salad, and each of us built the perfect pizza for us. A great meal in no time at all.

text: Blaze pizza on 15-501 in Durham is awesome. Friendly staff...good concept of one size pizza and set prices for build your own or specialty. Great pizza. Will return.

text: I'm giving this a 3 star only because. It was my first time eating there and customer service was a dry bone. Simple as that. Food was great.
